verses.verse: These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>,
Dan <S%H1835><s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and <S%H836>Asher<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: <S%H6147>Er<s%>, and <S%H209>Onan<s%>, and <S%H7956>Shelah<s%>; which <S%H7969>three<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him of <S%H7774>Shua<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanitess<s%>. And <S%H6147>Er<s%>, <S%H3063>Judah<s%>'s <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, was <S%H7451>wicked<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and he slew <S%H4191>him<s%>.
And <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> his <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H6557>Perez<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>. All the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%>: <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, and <S%H2538>Hamul<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>: <S%H2174>Zimri<s%>, and <S%H387>Ethan<s%>, and <S%H1968>Heman<s%>, and <S%H3633>Calcol<s%>, and <S%H1873>Dara<s%>; five of them in <S%H2568>all<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>: <S%H5917>Achar<s%>, the <S%H5916>troubler<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who committed a <S%H4603>trespass<s%> in the devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H387>Ethan<s%>: <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, that were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H3396>him<s%>: Jerahmeel, and <S%H7410>Ram<s%>, and <S%H3621>Chelubai<s%>.

And <S%H7410>Ram<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%>, and <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%>, <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>;
and <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H8007>Salma<s%>, and <S%H8007>Salma<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1162>Boaz<s%>,
and <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5744>Obed<s%>, and <S%H5744>Obed<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>;
and <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> his <S%H1060>first-born<s%> <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, and <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, and <S%H8092>Shimea<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>,
Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%>, <S%H7288>Raddai<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%>,
Ozem <S%H684><s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%>;

and their <S%H269>sisters<s%> were <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> and <S%H26>Abigail<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%>: <S%H52>Abishai<s%>, and <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, and <S%H6214>Asahel<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%>.
And <S%H26>Abigail<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H6021>Amasa<s%>; and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> was <S%H3500>Jether<s%> the <S%H3459>Ishmaelite<s%>.

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> children <S%H854>of<s%> <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and of <S%H3408>Jerioth<s%>; and these were her <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H3475>Jesher<s%>, and <S%H7727>Shobab<s%>, and <S%H715>Ardon<s%>.
And <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> unto him <S%H672>Ephrath<s%>, who <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H2354>Hur<s%>.
And <S%H2354>Hur<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H221>Uri<s%>, and <S%H221>Uri<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%>.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, whom he took to <S%H3947>wife<s%> when he was <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H7687>Segub<s%>.
And <S%H7687>Segub<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H2971>Jair<s%>, who had <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And <S%H1650>Geshur<s%> and <S%H758>Aram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair<s%> from <S%H7079>them<s%>, with Kenath, and the <S%H1323>villages<s%> <S%H8346>thereof<s%>, even threescore <S%H5892>cities<s%>. All these were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> was <S%H4194>dead<s%> in <S%H3613>Caleb-ephrathah<s%>, then <S%H29>Abijah<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H806>Ashhur<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H8620>Tekoa<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> were <S%H7410>Ram<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, and <S%H946>Bunah<s%>, and <S%H767>Oren<s%>, and <S%H684>Ozem<s%>, <S%H281>Ahijah<s%>.
And <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> had <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5851>Atarah<s%>; she was the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H208>Onam<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> were <S%H4619>Maaz<s%>, and <S%H3226>Jamin<s%>, and <S%H6134>Eker<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H208>Onam<s%> were <S%H8060>Shammai<s%>, and <S%H3047>Jada<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai<s%>: <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>, and <S%H51>Abishur<s%>.
And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H51>Abishur<s%> was <S%H32>Abihail<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H257>Ahban<s%>, and <S%H4140>Molid<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>: <S%H5540>Seled<s%>, and <S%H649>Appaim<s%>; but <S%H5540>Seled<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> without <S%H1121>children<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H649>Appaim<s%>: <S%H3469>Ishi<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi<s%>: <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%>: <S%H304>Ahlai<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3047>Jada<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai<s%>: <S%H3500>Jether<s%>, and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>; and <S%H3500>Jether<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> without <S%H1121>children<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>: <S%H6431>Peleth<s%>, and <S%H2117>Zaza<s%>. These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%>.

Now <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> had no <S%H1121>sons<s%>, but <S%H1323>daughters<s%>. And <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> had a <S%H5650>servant<s%>, an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3398>Jarha<s%>.
And <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H3398>Jarha<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H6262>Attai<s%>.
And <S%H6262>Attai<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H2066>Zabad<s%>,
and <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H654>Ephlal<s%>, and <S%H654>Ephlal<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5744>Obed<s%>,
and <S%H5744>Obed<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>, and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>,
and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H2503>Helez<s%>, and <S%H2503>Helez<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H501>Eleasah<s%>,
and <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5581>Sismai<s%>, and <S%H5581>Sismai<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>,
and <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3359>Jekamiah<s%>, and <S%H3359>Jekamiah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H476>Elishama<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> were <S%H4337>Mesha<s%> his <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, who was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4762>Mareshah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>: <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, and <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%>, and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%>, and <S%H8087>Shema<s%>.
And <S%H8087>Shema<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7357>Raham<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3421>Jorkeam<s%>; and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H8060>Shammai<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai<s%> was <S%H4584>Maon<s%>; and <S%H4584>Maon<s%> was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1049>Beth-zur<s%>.

And <S%H5891>Ephah<s%>, <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H2771>Haran<s%>, and <S%H4162>Moza<s%>, and <S%H1495>Gazez<s%>; and <S%H2771>Haran<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1495>Gazez<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3056>Jahdai<s%>: <S%H7276>Regem<s%>, and <S%H3147>Jothan<s%>, and <S%H1529>Geshan<s%>, and <S%H6404>Pelet<s%>, and <S%H5891>Ephah<s%>, and <S%H8174>Shaaph<s%>.
Maacah <S%H4601><s%>, <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H7669>Sheber<s%> and <S%H8647>Tirhanah<s%>.

She <S%H3205>bare<s%> also <S%H8174>Shaaph<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4089>Madmannah<s%>, <S%H7724>Sheva<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4343>Machbena<s%>, and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1388>Gibea<s%>; and the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> was <S%H5915>Achsah<s%>.

These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H672>Ephrathah<s%>: <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%>,
Salma <S%H8007><s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>, <S%H2780>Hareph<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1013>Beth-gader<s%>.
And <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%> had <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H7204>Haroeh<s%>, <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H2679>Menuhoth<s%>.

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H7157>Kiriath-jearim<s%>: The <S%H3505>Ithrites<s%>, and the <S%H6336>Puthites<s%>, and the <S%H8126>Shumathites<s%>, and the <S%H4954>Mishraites<s%>; of them <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H6882>Zorathites<s%> and the <S%H848>Eshtaolites<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8007>Salma<s%>: <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>, and the <S%H5200>Netophathites<s%>, <S%H5852>Atroth-beth<s%>-joab, <S%H5854><s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H2680>Manahathites<s%>, the <S%H6882>Zorites<s%>.

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H5608>scribes<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3258>Jabez<s%>: the <S%H8654>Tirathites<s%>, the <S%H8101>Shimeathites<s%>, the <S%H7756>Sucathites<s%>. <S%H1992>These<s%> are the <S%H7017>Kenites<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> of <S%H2574>Hammath<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%>.
